data.lyric:
[ti:AM I DREAMING]
[ar:Lil Nas X/Miley Cyrus]
[al:MONTERO (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]AM I DREAMING - Lil Nas X/Miley Cyrus (麦莉·赛勒斯)
[00:02.48]Lyrics by：Montero Hill/Denzel Baptiste/William K. Ward/David Biral/Omer Fedi/Miley Ray Cyrus/Vincent Goodyer
[00:04.96]Composed by：Montero Hill/Denzel Baptiste/William K. Ward/David Biral/Omer Fedi/Miley Ray Cyrus/Vincent Goodyer
[00:07.44]Lil Nas X：
[00:07.82]Every song every dream filled with help from beyond
[00:14.84]
[00:16.03]As I'm sinking I relive the story
[00:21.07]
[00:23.03]Every try every breakthrough and every cry
[00:30.10]
[00:31.32]As I'm sinking I relive the story
[00:36.43]
[00:38.55]Oh never forget me
[00:46.06]And everything I've done
[00:47.93]
[00:48.68]Oh never forget me
[00:55.53]
[00:56.20]Like I'm your favorite song
[00:58.02]I'm faded replaying these thoughts
[01:04.52]I thought were sinking down
[01:07.72]
[01:08.84]Whoa never forget me
[01:14.72]
[01:16.70]And everything I've done
[01:17.91]Miley Cyrus：
[01:18.16]
[01:19.36]Tears running dry
[01:21.25]
[01:21.80]Shattered inside but I still got a smile
[01:26.57]
[01:27.27]As I'm sinking I relive the story
[01:32.53]
[01:34.57]Glitter comes off
[01:36.37]
[01:37.13]Battered in blue but I gotta go on
[01:41.94]
[01:42.67]As I'm singing I rewrite my story
[01:47.58]Lil Nas/Miley Cyrus：
[01:48.19]
[01:49.38]Oh never forget me
[01:57.01]
[01:57.58]And everything I've done
[01:59.45]
[02:00.01]Oh never forget me
[02:05.95]
[02:07.54]Like I'm your favorite song
[02:09.63]I'm faded
[02:10.71]Faded
[02:11.21]
[02:11.98]Replaying these thoughts
[02:15.98]I thought were sinking down
[02:19.18]
[02:20.21]Whoa never forget me
[02:26.13]
[02:27.87]And everything I've done
